column4: Ok, you were wrong. It changed pretty much the entire Desktop.
I wasn't wrong. You didn't configure it the way it should be configured to work with gnome.
That's not the way you presented it, and that's what I was disagreeing with. Anyway, enough time wasted. Lets move on.

the problem is now that you set out not to solve your issue, but to prove me wrong. That is a waste of my time, so I'll stop responding to you now. There are plenty of people here who are more deserving.
